QuestData.Title: Whacking Weeds
QuestData.Description: Something needs to be done about the podling menace in Spiteleaf Thicket!$b$bAlongside Hemet Nesingwary, I've hunted some of the largest and most terrifying beasts around. Never in my life have I encountered a creature as vile, depraved, nefarious or degenerate as a podling!$b$bThe vicious little monsters spread themselves like weeds and if something isn't done, they'll spread across the entire continent!$b$bMake your way into Spiteleaf Thicket and slay as many podlings as you can find!
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you dealt with the podlings in Spiteleaf Thicket?
QuestData.RewardText: Great work, $n.$b$bI'm surprised we made it out of Spiteleaf Thicket alive! I can still hear the sound of their maniacal laughter as they swarmed us....
